features.additionalInfo: Your loan comes with a repayment redraw facility. Giving you access to additional repayments you made that put you ahead of your loan repayment schedule. $1,000 minimum redraw in branch.

An Everyday Offset is a transaction account that can be linked to a Standard Variable Rate home loan. The money you put in your linked Everyday Offset account reduces the balance on which the interest is charged on your home loan. You can have multiple Everyday Offset accounts linked to one home loan. Only available for individual borrowers, not companies or trusts.
Through a top up you can borrow an additional $10,000 or more - subject to equity held in your property and our approval.

Switching is a change to one or more aspects of your loan's terms and conditions, for example switching from a variable rate to a fixed rate or switching from Interest Only to Principal and Interest repayments.
Splitting is when you divide one loan into two or more loan accounts, generally with different loan types, repayment types or interest rates.

Lenders' Mortgage Insurance (LMI) or Low Deposit Premium (LDP) may apply where there is an increased risk associated with a home loan. The circumstances of your loan determine whether a loan will incur LMI or LDP. They are a one-off non-refundable, non-transferable cost added to the total loan amount. The LMI premium is not a bank fee or an establishment fee. The LDP is a bank fee and not an establishment fee.

Enjoy interest rate discounts, no establishment fees and no monthly loan service fees for eligible home loans, and no annual fee on one eligible credit card. To receive these benefits you must qualify for the Wealth Package and have an initial package lending balance of at least $150,000 when you apply for a package.
Additional repayments can be made at any time. No fees apply.
Wherever you are in the world, CommBank gives you the choice and control to securely manage all of your accounts on a range of devices, the way you want.

A guarantor is someone who agrees to be responsible for repaying a debt owed to us under a loan provided to another individual or business if the borrower (or borrowers) cannot make their repayments. A guarantor supports the loan by providing us with an additional security such as their home. By providing a guarantee, we may lend to the borrower in situations where they may not have been able to secure the full amount of the loan they require.

This loan can be used for the purposes of owner occupied property purchases, refinancing your existing home loan, purchasing of vacant land (non-commercial), personal needs (e.g. home renovations, consolidation of personal debt, personal investments), off the plan purchases, bridging loan and building/construction purposes.
This loan cannot be used for business purposes

For eligible owner occupied home loans, Home Loan Compassionate Care is complimentary protection that helps support you by paying your home loan repayments for around 12 months if you, your spouse or dependant passes away or is medically certified with a terminal illness. Please refer to  Home Loan Compassionate Care guide for more information.
Enjoy $2,000 cashback when you refinance your eligible home loan to Commbank.

constraints.additionalInfo: For a Standard Variable Rate Loan, there is a minimum loan amount of $10,000 for new loans and Top-Ups.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Individuals (natural persons, including as Trustee of a Family Trust) must have the legal capacity to enter into the loan contract, provide acceptable identification documentation and be 18 years or older.
Applications for home loans are subject to the Bank's normal credit approval.

Individuals must either be living in Australia as an Australian citizen, New Zealand citizen, Australian permanent resident or specified temporary Australian resident; or be an overseas citizen co-borrowing with an Australian citizen or Australian permanent resident or be living overseas as an Australian citizen or Australian permanent resident.

fees.name: Establishment fee

eligibility.additionalInfo: As part of the Wealth Package you'll get special discounts on your home loan. To be eligible for a package you must have an initial ‘package lending balance’ (total of all eligible home loans and the credit limit of Viridian Line of Credit) of at least $150,000 at the time of applying.

discounts.additionalInfo: No upfront home loan establishment fees

fees.additionalInfo: Payable to cover the costs the Bank incurs in establishing your loan and unless it is waived by us, is payable at the date of settlement or funding. It does not include other fees and charges also payable at the time of entering into the loan such as those associated with the settlement of the loan or the particular circumstances of the loan (excluding Off the Plan Purchase). Split Loans with Variable and Fixed Rate Options - $600 for each of the 1st two loans plus $300 for each additional loan.

fees.name: Loan service fee

eligibility.additionalInfo: As part of the Wealth Package you'll get special discounts on your home loan. To be eligible for a package you must have an initial ‘package lending balance’ (total of all eligible home loans and the credit limit of Viridian Line of Credit) of at least $150,000 at the time of applying.

discounts.additionalInfo: No monthly home loan service fees

fees.additionalInfo: For home loans, unless it is waived by us, the fee is charged monthly to each Loan Account on the repayment due date.

fees.name: Establishment fee (Off the Plan Purchase)

eligibility.additionalInfo: As part of the Wealth Package you'll get special discounts on your home loan. To be eligible for a package you must have an initial ‘package lending balance’ (total of all eligible home loans and the credit limit of Viridian Line of Credit) of at least $150,000 at the time of applying.

discounts.additionalInfo: No upfront home loan establishment fees (Off the Plan Purchase)

fees.additionalInfo: Payable for Off the Plan Purchases for new and existing home loan (variable rate only),  to cover the costs the Bank incurs in establishing your loan and unless it is waived by us, is payable at the date of settlement or funding. It does not include other fees and charges also payable at the time of entering into the loan such as those associated with the settlement of the loan or the particular circumstances of the loan

fees.name: Settlement Fee
fees.additionalInfo: $150 if the disclosure date in the contract is before 03/02/12. Payable regardless of whether we attend settlement or not, when the Bank or our representatives, arranges the funding of the loan.

fees.name: Settlement Cheque Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if you require additional cheques (more than two) to fund/settle the loan. Fee applied per cheque.

fees.name: Late Payment Fee
fees.additionalInfo: For home loans - If your account falls into arrears, you will be charged a late payment fee. The fee is payable on the fifth business day after the monthly repayment due date. We will continue to charge the fee monthly until you repay all arrears or you enter into an arrangement with us for the full repayment of those arrears (even if you repay your loan weekly or fortnightly). If you break that arrangement the fee will continue to apply.

fees.name: Settlement Fee (Discharge)
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if you discharge the loan, i.e. either sell part or all of the Security Property or refinance your Loan with another credit provider.

fees.name: Access fee (overseas transactions) through the Automatic Teller Machines of ASB Bank in New Zealand, Commonwealth Bank in Indonesia and Commonwealth Bank in Vietnam.
fees.additionalInfo: Access Fees (overseas transactions) through the Automatic Teller Machines of ASB Bank in New Zealand, Commonwealth Bank in Indonesia and Commonwealth Bank in Vietnam.

fees.name: Access Fees (overseas transactions) through the Cirrus, MasterCard or Visa Plus ATM cash withdrawal in foreign currency.
fees.additionalInfo: Access Fees (overseas transactions) through the Cirrus, MasterCard or Visa Plus ATM cash withdrawal in foreign currency.

fees.name: Access Fees (overseas transactions) through the Cirrus, MasterCard or Visa Plus ATM cash withdrawal in foreign currency.
fees.additionalInfo: Access Fees (overseas transactions) through the Cirrus, MasterCard or Visa Plus ATM cash withdrawal in foreign currency.

fees.name: Access Fees (overseas transactions) through the Maestro (EFTPOS) or Debit MasterCard purchase in Australian dollars when overseas.
fees.additionalInfo: Access Fees (overseas transactions) through the Maestro (EFTPOS) or Debit MasterCard purchase in Australian dollars when overseas.

fees.name: Access Fees (overseas transactions) through the Maestro (EFTPOS) or Debit MasterCard purchase in foreign currency (or transaction that involves a currency conversion).
fees.additionalInfo: Access Fees (overseas transactions) through the Maestro (EFTPOS) or Debit MasterCard purchase in foreign currency (or transaction that involves a currency conversion).

fees.name: Additional Security Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if we require you to provide more than one security (i.e. the security used to support the repayment of the loan), and one or more of these securities is ‘new’ i.e. does not already secure another loan. Fee is applied  per 'new' security.

fees.name: ATM fees within Australia
fees.additionalInfo: The Bank does not charge Access Fees on withdrawals or account balance enquiries on transaction and savings accounts (including MISA), home loans, investment home loans and lines of credit through non-Commonwealth Bank ATMs in Australia. However, ATM owners may charge a fee, which will be disclosed at the time of the transaction. If you proceed with the transaction, the ATM owner's fee will be debited to your account (in addition to the withdrawal amount, if applicable). You should check the ATM owner's fees that apply carefully before completing transactions at non-Commonwealth Bank ATMs in Australia.

fees.name: Periodical Payments or Transfers
fees.additionalInfo: $1.80 plus transfer fee, bank cheque fee and postage as applicable.

fees.name: Progressive Drawing Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when the Bank makes a number of progressive payments to fund your loan amount. Payable at your final drawing. Fee is applied per drawing.

fees.name: Security Guarantee Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if a guarantor is listed on the loan schedule. Fee is applied per borrower.

fees.name: Security Substitution fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if you ask us to substitute one of your securities with another.

fees.name: Special clearance fees
fees.additionalInfo: $15 per cheque plus any out of pocket cost. Payable if you ask us for a special clearance on a cheque deposited in the Loan Account.

fees.name: Stop payment notice fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if you ask us to stop payment on a cheque you have written. Fee is applied per request.

fees.name: Top Up Establishment Fee

eligibility.additionalInfo: As part of the Wealth Package you'll get special discounts on your home loan. To be eligible for a package you must have an initial ‘package lending balance’ (total of all eligible home loans and the credit limit of Viridian Line of Credit) of at least $150,000 at the time of applying.

fees.additionalInfo: Unless waived by us, it is charged when you increase an existing home loan/Viridian Line of Credit.

fees.name: Voucher Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if you ask us to retrieve a voucher (i.e. deposit, credit or debit slips) that records a transaction on the Loan Account. $4 per voucher (minimum charge $12) or $60 per hour spent to retrieve voucher(s).

fees.name: Trust Investigation Fee and UTC Clause 2.1
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if we incur investigation cost for loans involving a Trust. This fee applies even if we don't give you a loan. (Refer to UTC Clause 2.1).

fees.name: Wealth Package
fees.additionalInfo: Add a Wealth Package to your eligible home loan to enjoy interest rate discounts and no establishment fees for eligible home loans. To receive these benefits you must qualify for the Wealth Package and have an initial package lending balance of at least $150,000 when you apply for a package. Fee is charged annually.

lendingRates.additionalInfo: Owner Occupied - Principal and Interest repayment type

applicabilityConditions.additionalInfo: Get a discounted interest rate depending on the Loan to Value ratio (LVR), and access to further interest rate discounts. To be eligible for a package, you must have an initial ‘package lending balance’ (total of all eligible home loans and the credit limit of Viridian Line of Credit) of at least $150,000 at the time of applying. From 19 November 2022, any new Standard Variable Rate home loans or top ups on existing Standard Variable Rate home loans, which are participating in a Package Agreement, are eligible for discounted interest rates based on LVR.
For home loans with new lending at 'Loan to Valuation Ratio' of <=60%

lendingRates.additionalInfo: Owner Occupied - Principal and Interest repayment type with Wealth Package

applicabilityConditions.additionalInfo: Get a discounted interest rate depending on the Loan to Value ratio (LVR), and access to further interest rate discounts. From 19 November 2022, any new Standard Variable Rate home loans or top ups on existing Standard Variable Rate home loans, which are participating in a Package Agreement, are eligible for discounted interest rates based on LVR.

data.name: Standard Variable Rate Home Loan
data.description: A competitive variable rate home loan with access to offset and an extensive range of features.
